name: Happy Rhymes 1 - Story 4
description: Express Publishing enters the world of Play Store with Happy Rhymes 1.   Get a sneak peek at what Happy Rhymes 1 has to offer in this free version! Bring your favourite nursery characters to life!   Hey Diddle Diddle includes:   *Fully interactive story  *Animated song and story  *Interactive fun activities & games  *Picture dictionary with audio   Suitable for children 2-8 years old.   Innovative interaction for tablets and smartphones running Android.
